name: Bad Sushi
description:
A game I made for a University Assignment using Unity Game Engine.

It's a Zelda clone where you must locate 8 sacred octopi to escape a strange dreamscape.

Sprite work and programming by George W J.

https://www.instagram.com/georgewilliamjames/

Titlecard Art by Dan.

https://www.instagram.com/revised_dan/

Music by Taylor.

https://www.instagram.com/mrtmoulton/

All other sounds sourced from http://freesound.org/
